Description: Fragment of arched sistrum: only the beginnings of the arch survive on each side; at the base of the arch is a seated cat. The capital has nine uraei on both front and back and four on each side, with the sun discs distributed arbitrarily between them. The double Hathor head has an unusually long, curled wig. There are two lateral uraei, one with the white crown and one with the red crown. The handle is cylindrical and has been mended down the front. There is a separate base-cap, which has a hole at the bottom.
